datasource.data_def: {label: "mendel", data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(200,0,0)"}
datasource.label: mendel

datasource.data_def: {label: "nemo", data: d2, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(0,200,0)"}
datasource.label: nemo

plots.options: legend: { position: "nw"}, xaxis: { axisLabel: "generations"}, yaxis: { min: 0.5, axisLabel: "fitness"}, legend: { position: 'se' }
plots.title: fitness: mendel-f90 vs mendel-go

datasource.data_def: {label: "mendel-f90", data: d1, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(200,0,0)"}
datasource.label: mendel-f90

datasource.data_def: {label: "mendel-go", data: d2, lines: { show: true }, color: "rgb(0,200,0)"}
datasource.label: mendel-go

plots.options: legend: { position: "nw"}, xaxis: { axisLabel: "generations"}, yaxis: { axisLabel: "avg mutations per individual"}
plots.title: mutations: mendel-f90 vs mendel-go
